snippet.title: Leisure Suit Larry Land of the Lounge Lizards-Trailer (1987)
snippet.description: The biggest cult hero in computer gaming history in his first-ever 3D Animated Adventure from Sierra On-Line! This is a classic trailer (or "non-playable demo" as they called them) from 1987 to advertise this hot new game from Al Lowe. Recorded using the Tandy 3-Voice PC Speaker for the best sound that an AGI game has to offer. Enjoy!
